file you think your data is now on the hard drive right well that's not actually what happens operating systems
actually store that data in a buffer and then write that data to the hard drive whenever it's a good time for the

guarantee that your file is in a good State like for a database program or for
an accounting program or some kind of transactional thing well so a lot of

continues on and this is great for people who like wrote databases for
Windows 3 .1 and earlier operating systems and they really liked this
